MAN.TITLE: recompilefunction
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: recompiles a scilab function, changing its type

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string, name of the function to recompile
: string: "n" (noncompiled, type 11), "c" (compiled, type 13) or "p" (compiled, type 13, with provision for profiling). Default "c".

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.P: This function reverse-compiles a function variable via fun2string, and recompiles it to the desired kind with deff.

MAN.EXAMPLE: recompilefunction("asinh","p") for i=1:100; asinh(rand(100,100)); end showprofile(asinh)
